description: This file defines the AuthService class, which provides authentication-related functionalities such as saving, reading, and clearing tokens using shared preferences, and determining user landing paths based on roles and JWT token hints.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class managing authentication tokens in shared preferences and role-based navigation logic.

methods.name: saveToken
methods.description: Stores the authentication token persistently in shared preferences.

methods.name: readToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored authentication token from shared preferences.

methods.name: clearToken
methods.description: Removes the stored authentication token from shared preferences.

methods.name: roleToLandingPath
methods.description: Determines the landing path URL based on user roles and JWT token hints.
